item.name: List all executions with incomplete log storage
List Scheduled Jobs For a Cluster Server
List Scheduled Jobs For this Cluster Server
Upload a File for a Job Option
List Files Uploaded for a Job
Get Info About an Uploaded File

body.raw:
- defaultTab: nodes
  description: Invoca a API do Graylog para criar o input
  executionEnabled: true
  loglevel: INFO
  name: Graylog-create-input-5
  nodeFilterEditable: false
  options:
  - name: BASIC_AUTH
    value: YWRtaW46YWRtaW4=
  - name: URL
    value: http://graylog:9000
  plugins:
    ExecutionLifecycle: null
  scheduleEnabled: true
  sequence:
    commands:
    - description: Execução do Script
      exec: /tmp/graylog-create-input.sh ${option.URL} ${option.BASIC_AUTH}
    keepgoing: false
    strategy: node-first

- defaultTab: nodes
  description: Invoca a API do Grafana para criar o datasource
  executionEnabled: true
  loglevel: INFO
  name: Grafana-create-datasource
  nodeFilterEditable: false
  options:
  - name: BASIC_AUTH
    value: YWRtaW46YWRtaW4=
  - name: ELASTICSEARCH_URL
    value: http://elasticsearch:9200
  - name: URL
    value: http://grafana:3000
  plugins:
    ExecutionLifecycle: null
  scheduleEnabled: true
  sequence:
    commands:
    - exec: /tmp/grafana-create-datasource.sh ${option.URL} ${option.BASIC_AUTH} ${option.ELASTICSEARCH_URL}
    keepgoing: false
    strategy: node-first

- defaultTab: nodes
  description: Invoca a API do Grafana para criar o dashboard
  executionEnabled: true
  loglevel: INFO
  name: Grafana-create-dashboard
  nodeFilterEditable: false
  options:
  - name: URL
    value: http://grafana:3000
  - name: BASIC_AUTH
    value: YWRtaW46YWRtaW4=
  plugins:
    ExecutionLifecycle: null
  scheduleEnabled: true
  sequence:
    commands:
    - exec: /tmp/grafana-create-dashboard.sh ${option.URL} ${option.BASIC_AUTH}
    keepgoing: false
    strategy: node-first
